General.Name: Groupe Parot SA
General.Description: Groupe Parot SA engages in the distribution of new and used passenger cars, utility vehicles, and heavy goods vehicles in France. The company distributes private vehicles under the Ford and Mazda brands; and commercial and heavy goods vehicles, such as industrial vehicles, semi-trailers, and light commercial vehicles, as well as spare parts under the IVECO, FIAT PROFESSIONAL, MAN, ZF, GRANALU, and Kässbohrer brands. It also provides maintenance and repair services, as well as mechanical and bodywork of vehicles; and financing, insurance, and guarantee services. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bruges, France.
